sentence: Delphi Automotive announced that its board of directors has approved an increase in the annual dividend rate paid on its ordinary shares to $1.16 per ordinary share, and declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.29 per ordinary share, payable on Feb. 29, 2016, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Feb. 17, 2016.

Standard Motor Products, an automotive replacement parts manufacturer and distributor, announced that its Board of Directors has approved an increase in its quarterly common stock dividend from fifteen cents per share to seventeen cents per share, payable on March 1, 2016 to stockholders of record on February 16, 2016.

The Board of Directors of Procter & Gamble declared a quarterly dividend of $0.6629 per share on the Common Stock payable on or after February 16, 2016, to Common Stock shareholders of record at the close of business on January 22, 2016.

International Paper declared a quarterly dividend of $0.44 per share for the period from January 1, 2016, to March 31, 2016, inclusive, on its common stock, par value $1.00.
This dividend is payable on March 15, 2016, to holders of record at the close of business on February 16, 2016.
Qualcomm announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.48 per common share, payable on March 23, 2016, to stockholders of record at the close of business on March 02, 2016.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
